alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau and southeastern Camden Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingsland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Kings Bay Base and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
